snippet: State police searching for a survivalist accused of killing a trooper said Tuesday that they found two pipe bombs in the woods that were capable of causing significant damage.
abstract: Pennsylvania state police searching for Eric Frein, survivalist accused of killing a trooper in sniper ambush, say that they found two pipe bombs in the woods that were capable of causing significant damage.
lead_paragraph: State police searching for a survivalist accused of killing a trooper said Tuesday that they found two pipe bombs in the woods that were capable of causing significant damage.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Pipe Bombs Found in Manhunt
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Pipe Bombs Discovered in Manhunt
